text.help-text: Be succinct, accurate, and equivalent in presenting the same content and function of the image. Do NOT be redundant or provide the same information as text within the context of the image. Do NOT use the phrases "image of ..." or "graphic of ..." to describe the image. https://webaim.org/techniques/alttext/
text.label: Alternate Text

text.help-text: Primary title text
text.label: Headline

text.help-text: Be succinct, accurate, and equivalent in presenting the same content and function of the image. Do NOT be redundant or provide the same information as text within the context of the image. Do NOT use the phrases "image of ..." or "graphic of ..." to describe the image. https://webaim.org/techniques/alttext/
text.label: Alternate Text
